body.ab:
slob dpon klu grub kyi dongs pa 'grel pa la mi mthun pa du ma yod pa yin te | slob dpon legs ldan 'byed lasogs pas slob dpon gyi thugs dngos pa rgyud du bkrel la || slob dpon zla ba grags pa lasogs pas thal du bkrel
lo || slob dpon klu grub kyis 'thal 'gyur du zla ba grags pa la bkral la | zla grags kyi thugs dgongs dge bshes lo tsa bas bkrel bas slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis la don rnams pa drug ste |

jo bos kyang |
ma mthong bar nyid de mthong par ||
shin rta zab pa'i mdo las gsungssDe dge: ma mthong ba nyid de mthong bar || shin tu zab pa'i mdo las gsungs || zhes bshad do ||
dge bshes kyi zhal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don dam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa yin gsung |
slob dpon gyi zhal nas bden pa gnyis ga'i ngo bo ston pa gsung |

slob dpon gyi zhal nas dbang po gsal ba ste rab rib lasogs pas dbang po nyams par ma byas shing yul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa dang | de yang 'jig rten rnams kyis bden par byed pa de yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid
du shes par bya ste || de skad du yang 'jug pa las |gnod pa myed pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis || bzung pa gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs ste || 'jig rten nyid las bden zhes bshad pas de'i steng du 'jig rten bas bden par byed pa de yang dag kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin no gsung ||

dge bshes kyi chos can mthun snang myed pa'i rigs pa gdu gdu ba ni chos can bya ba shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa yin ba la rgol ba dngos por smra ba lasogs pa chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang rang bzhin myed par shes par 'dod pa yod kyang | dbu ma bas snang ba rten 'brel 'di brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu dang
rang bzhin myed par rtogs zin pas shes 'dod myed pas chos can mthun snang myed do ||

rang rgyud pa na re chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di tshad mas grub kyang don dam du thal ba'i nyes pa myed ste | tha snyad pa'i tshad mas grub kyang chos can kyang snang ba rten 'brel 'di cig dang du
bral lasogs pa rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zer na |

rngog gi zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan
nyid myed pa yin gsung | slang ba'i zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid ni | tshul ci rigs su khas blangs pa yin gsung |

sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams kyi zhal nas khyab pa dngos po la gnas shing phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa de yin no zer ba la | rngog gi zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur bya ba bzlog pa rang rgyud dang 'brel ba yin
pa la | sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams kyi de bzlog pa dang ma 'brel bas bsgrub pa'i thabs 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos po la gnas pa phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa skabs su bab pa'i dam bca la tshad ma'i bsal ba byung ba la bzhed do ||

slang pa ba'i zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni sngon gyi bshad pa mkhan po rnams kyi des chog pa yin te | bsgrub pa'i thal
gyur du 'dug pa tsam gyis bzlog pa rang rgyud 'phen pa'i nges pa myed ste | bzlog pa dang 'brel bya ba de bzlog pa 'phen pa'i nus pa yod byas pa yin myi|gyi nus pa yod pa tsam gyis bzlog pa 'phen pa'i * myed pa ste | dper na sa bon skya bo la my gu skyed ming nus pa yod kyang nus pa yod pa tsam gyis ci'i kyang mas kyang my gu skyed pa'i nges pa myed pa bzhin no gsung | gnyis pa sun 'byin pa'i thal
'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro ||

pa tshab kyi zhal nas bsgrub pa'i thabs thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rgol bas zhe bas 'dod pa yin la | sun 'byin pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid thal 'gyur de'i gtan tshigs khas blangs sam khas blangs kyi mthar thug pa yin no gsung ||
dge bshes kyi zhal nas yul can shes pa la yang dag log pa ni yod pa kun rdzob myed gsung ba la | de'i rgyu mshan ni 'di yin no bya ba ni mi gsung skad do ||

slob dpon gyi zhal nas shes bya yul la yod na yul can shes pa la yang kun rdzob yod pa
yin te rgyu mtshan la khyad par myed pa'i phyir dang | gzhan yang | gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste zhes pa lasogs pa shes pa'i steng du kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don bshad pa byas nas | yul can shes pa'i steng na yang dag dang log pa yod la kun rdzob myed zer ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no gsung ||

dge bshes pa'i rang dga' ma yin te 'jug pa las | gti mug rang bzhin srib phyir kun rdzob ste |
des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni |kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te | bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o zhes bshad do ||

slob dpon gyi zhal nas nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin la | nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa las gzhan nyon mongs pa can ma
yin pa'i ma rig pa de rab rib dang dmyigs ser lasogs pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad ni | log pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te zhes spyi thod du bstan kyang chog gsung ngo ||
jo bo'i zhal nas kyang | ci yang ma grub chos nyid la | gnyis dang gsum rtsogs ga la yod zhes bshad pa yin no ||

dge bshes lo tsa ba'i zhal nas mtshan gzhi dang mtshan
nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la |

slob dpon chos mchog dang slang pha bas "Slang pha ba" identiied as "Khyung rin chen grags" by Apple mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid rngos po la yod kyi mtshon bya ni rngos po la myed ste brtags par bzhed pa yin no ||

kha cig na re khyed thal 'gyur ba la yongs cos sgrub pa'i dam bca myed pas de sgrub par byed pas gtan tshigs lasogs pa tshad mas grub pa mi dgos pa bden khongs su gzhug gi | rnam dpyad dgag pa'i dam bca yod dam myed | yod na de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshgis brjod dgos la | de ni de 'gal ba rjod pa'i thal 'gyur lasogs
pa brjod pa dgos pa ci yod zhe na zer ro ||

jo bos gsungs pa bzhin du ye shes phyed chad bya ba yin te shes bya cir yang ma grub pa la ye shes kyis ci
yang mi rtog pa ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yod la | ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba dang bcas pa ni myed pa yin no bya ba gsung |
bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa slob dpon gyi gsung tshod bris pa || rdzogs s+ho ||||
